official_title: To amend section 5547 of title 5, United States Code, to include certain employees of the Department of Commerce within the definition of the term "forest firefighter".

summary.text: Includes National Weather Service personnel of the Department of Commerce among other Federal forest fire fighters who are eligible to be paid overtime while serving on forest wildfire emergencies.

titles.title: To amend section 5547 of title 5, United States Code, to include certain employees of the Department of Commerce within the definition of the term "forest firefighter".
